name: todo-backend
description: Backend para To-Do List con Railway MySQL

scripts.railway:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mysql = require('mysql2'); const connection = mysql.createConnection({host: process.env.DB_HOST, port: process.env.DB_PORT, user: process.env.DB_USER, password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD, database: process.env.DB_NAME, ssl: {rejectUnauthorized: false}}); connection.connect(err => {if(err) {console.error('❌ Error:', err.message); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ Conectado a Railway MySQL'); connection.end();});"
